result.html: foireann peile an chontaeThe county football team.
result.ponchtml: foireann peile an ċontaeThe county football team.

result.eng: The owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ga: ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.orig: ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.html: ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ponchtml: ġaḃ an t-úinéir buíoċas lena ḟoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.

result.eng: The team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ga: i ngaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.orig: i ngaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.html: i ngaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ponchtml: i ngaeilge aṁáin a ḃeiḋ an ḟoireann ag plé le gaċ gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.

result.eng: They overcame the other team easily.
result.ga: sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.orig: sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.html: sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.
result.ponchtml: ẛáraiġ siad an ḟoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.

result.eng: The county's football team is going from strength to strength.
result.ga: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neart
result.orig: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neart
result.html: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neartThe county's football team is going from strength to strength.
result.ponchtml: tá foireann peile an ċontae ag dul ó neart go neartThe county's football team is going from strength to strength.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
result.ga: bhí bua éasca ag an gcabhán ar fhoireann aontroma
result.orig: bhí bua éasca ag an gcabhán ar fhoireann aontroma
result.html: bhí bua éasca ag an gcabhán ar fhoireann aontromaCavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
result.ponchtml: ḃí bua éasca ag an gcaḃán ar ḟoireann aontromaCavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
